Sentencas: LaxSr1-xMnO3 (LSM) is commonly used as a protective layer on the metallic interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to prevent surface oxidation and chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: However, the volume shrinkage at elevated temperatures causes the LSM coatings to crack, resulting in chromium diffusion.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: Therefore, this paper investigates the effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructure and electrical properties of ferritic stainless steels coated with La0.67Sr0.33MnO3 (LSM).
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: Four ferritic stainless steels were selected for use as interconnect substrates: Crofer22APU, Crofer22H, ss441, and ZMG232L.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: The candidate materials were pre-oxidised at 850 degrees C for 25 and 50 h, respectively.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: After the pre-oxidation process, the LSM films with a thickness of 3-4 mu m were deposited on the surface of samples by using Pulsed DC magnetron sputtering.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: After aging the coated specimens at elevated temperatures, the morphologies and crystalline structures were examined using SEM/EDX and XRD, respectively.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: The results indicated that the pre-oxidised layer, (Mn, Cr)(3)O-4, could significantly suppress chromium penetration from the interior to the surface of the specimens.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels

Sentencas: Moreover, the area specific resistance (ASR) values for the 25-h pre-oxidised specimens were 2.24, 12.21, 2.30, and 6.77 m Omega cm(2) for Crofer22APU, Crofer22H, ss441, and ZMG2321, respectively, at 800 degrees C for 500 h in an air atmosphere.
Titulo: Effects of pre-oxidation on the microstructural and electrical properties of La0.67Sr0.33MnO3-δ coated ferritic stainless steels
